definition: balance scale/Taiwan pr. [tian1 ping2]
day/sky/heaven
steelyard/Roman balance/CL:臺|台[tai2]
variant of 稱|称[cheng1], to weigh
Libra (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: The sign is ruled by Venus.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的守護星是金星。

sentences.english: Libra was re-defined by the Romans as a separate constellation of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座被羅馬人重新定義爲黃道十二宮中單獨的一宮。

sentences.english: The symbol of Libra is the scales of a balance.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的標誌是一架平衡的天平。
摩羯座給予天秤座以情感支持。

sentences.english: In case there is a collision of characters Libra should concede.
sentences.chinese: 當出現性格上的碰撞時，天秤需要做出讓步。

sentences.english: Libra is an air sign, like Gemini and Aquarius.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座和雙子，水瓶一樣，是一個風象星座。

sentences.english: It is difficult for the Libra to get on well with a Cancer's changeable temperament.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹多變的性情也讓天秤感覺難以相處。

sentences.english: It will be an auspicious day for Libra men.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座男人的黃道吉日。

sentences.english: Both Libra and Gemini are Air Signs.
sentences.chinese: 天秤和雙子都是風象星座。

sentences.english: Libra is very sociable and likes being a part of a group.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座善於交際，喜歡融合於集體之中。

sentences.english: In summer, there will still be another leap for Librans.
sentences.chinese: 夏天，天秤們仍將面臨另外一個坎。

sentences.english: Love for luxury is one of the personality traits of Libra.
sentences.chinese: 愛好奢華是天秤的一大特徵。

sentences.english: Hi! I am Teacher Lovely and my star sign is Libra.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我是樂蒂老師，天秤座女生。

sentences.english: This could be one of the reasons Librans make good lawyers and judges.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼天秤座適合做律師和法官的原因。

sentences.english: Aquarius is an air sign, like Gemini and Libra.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座和雙子座，天秤座一樣都是風象形作。

definition: Capricorn (star sign)/northern people in classical times, a branch of the Huns or Xiongnu 匈奴
Cancer (star sign)
Scorpio (constellation)
Pisces (star sign)
Aries (star sign)
Gemini (star sign)
Libra (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Taurus (star sign)/Jinniu district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Cancer (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Gemini (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
Capricornus
